title: Sales volume of USB flash drives in Germany 2004 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sales volume in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 15.
Overall Sales volume in millions has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Sales volume in millions, of value 16.17 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Sales volume in millions, of value 2.03 was reported at Year 2004
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Sales volume in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 15.
Overall Sales volume in millions has increased over the Year.

Sales volume in millions is rapidly increasing from 2004 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, roughly increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and lastly roughly constant from 2013 to 2018.
